## introduction 

The content of the ETN follows the FAIR principle and includes:
•	A description/elaboration on the tasks performed
•	Research, comparisons and background information
•	Problems and solutions
•	Location of scripts and datasets
•	(Daily) feedback on the tasks provided by the traineeship supervisor(s)
